block.p: VANADIUM INTERNATIONAL INC., Reno, Nev., a company that explores for precious metals, said it agreed to buy the closely held Reno-based Cleartron Corporation, which is building a wireless communications network that uses low bandwidth to monitor remote devices like gas meters. The price would be about $81.8 million in stock.
